title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 §§ 56-7.6 - Personal protective equipment (ppe)
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 §§ 56-7.6 - Personal protective equipment (ppe)

State Regulations

After the installation of the personal decontamination
system, full PPE in compliance with current OSHA regulations shall be worn in
regulated abatement work areas during preparation activities, for all friable
OSHA Class I or Class II asbestos projects. Asbestos abatement contractor's
respirator selection, filter selection, medical surveillance and respiratory
training must be consistent with current OSHA regulations. Appropriate
respiratory protection is also required of authorized visitors in accordance
with this Part. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12
§§
56-7.6

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
